enum.name: shared_veterancy_type
enum.comment: This is whether the unit RECEIVES shared veterancy from squads with squad_shared_veterancy_ext. In general, any squad that can fight should have no_sharing.

group.name: state_tree_references
group.comment: State tree that increases the EXPERIENCE that this entity grants to enemies when its dead.
